title: Halloween Puzzle
description: A relaxing jigsaw puzzle game full of Halloween themed images. Go through the levels and use different ways of finishing current level. Halloween themed jigsaw is here for you.
instructions: Move jigsaw puzzles into pre-prepared spaces and use available bonuses to complete levels more efficiently. Each level is visually unique and represents different levels of difficulty, choose the appropriate setting of your skills.

title: Puzzle Balls
description: Unique physics based ball puzzler. Guide the happy ball and friends through many fun and challenging handcrafted puzzles. Each puzzle is designed to make you think a different way providing many unique challenges along the way.
instructions: Click / tap the screen to drop balls into the truck

title: Fourtris Saving Pigs
description: Fourtris Saving Pigs is an arcade game based on tetris in which you must form trios and blocks making the platform with the pigs go down until you reach the ground, making you then level up, having to continue where you left off using your wits to reach the highest level possible. .
instructions: Use A,D to rotate blocks, Arrow keys to Move and Speed.

title: Power Transmission Puzzle
description: Power Transmission Puzzle is an additive puzzle game. You'll need to connect the light bulb with a power source to light it up. Tap on a wire or a light bulb to rotate it to a proper orientation. Play now!
instructions: Tap on a wire or a light bulb to rotate it to a proper orientation.

title: Halloween Words Search
description: Welcome to the Halloween Word Search game! Dive into the Halloween spirit as you search for words related to this festive occasion. Your goal is to locate each word in a straight line of blocks, whether it's horizontally, vertically, or diagonally in any direction. To complete a level, find all the words displayed in the left panel. Can you conquer all the levels and become the ultimate Halloween word search champion? Challenge yourself and start searching now!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Lipuzz Water Sort Puzzle
description: You will think a lot and have a lot of fun while playing the Lipuzz game. A great game to exercise memory. The aim of the game is to collect liquids of the same color in a container by transferring the liquids in the containers to each other. The most important rule in the game is that the container you want to pour the liquid into must either be empty or the other container must have the same color liquid. If you can't pass the level in the game, you can get another container from the top menu.
instructions: Touch the screen on mobile devices. Use mouse for computer

title: Detective Loupe Puzzle
description: Hello detective! Please help, we have dozens of unsolved mysteries, filled with riddles, hidden objects, differences that need to be found, and similar stuff. Who's a murderer, who's a vampire, who is not a zombie, who's in love...? Only one person can solve it - detective Loupe!
instructions: It's easy - find the clues and tap them. When you got all of them, the level is completed. Sometimes, you'll have to pick one of the offered answers. You'll find your way :)

title: Spot 5 Differences
description: Welcome to the ultimate test of your attention to detail! In this exciting game, your mission is to spot five subtle differences between two seemingly identical images. It's a game of sharp eyes and keen observation. Each level presents a new set of images, each more challenging than the last. Can you train your eyes to notice the differences that others might miss? Put your skills to the test and become the master of spotting differences in this thrilling and visually stimulating game!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Simon Say
description: The game creates a series of tones and lights and requires a user to repeat the sequence. If the user succeeds, the series becomes progressively longer and more complex. Once the user fails, the game is over.
instructions: Mouse and Touch.

title: Animals Pic Tetriz
description: Welcome to Animal Pic Tetris! This game offers a delightful twist on the classic Tetris experience. Your task is to drop and arrange picture pieces to form complete animal images. Simply press the piece, move it to the right spot, and release it to create the perfect picture. With 8 exciting levels to conquer, this game promises hours of fun and challenge. Can you piece together all the animal images and emerge as the Tetris champion? Dive in and give it your best shot!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Blocky Chains
description: Welcome to Blocky Chain! Your task is to connect similar candies by using the touchpad or mouse. Form groups of 3 or more candies that are adjacent either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to turn their blocks' color blue. To complete each level, ensure that all the blocks are turned blue. With a total of 24 levels to tackle, can you conquer them all and become the ultimate Blocky Chain master? Get ready for some candy-connecting fun!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Pool Party
description: This summer is hot! Time for a cool down. Time for a Pool Party! Pack your towel and bathing suit to join Bunni on her trip to the water park! Here you'll have lots of fun playing colorful match-3 puzzles. Burst water balloons and remove all unwanted objects from the pool. Use the beach ball or the water gun to burst more balloons and spray away the algae, dirt, and rubbish. Combine multiple balloons of the same color to create super balloons that burst entire lines of balloons. It's so much fun! Complete daily challenges or go on a treasure hunt with pirate Bunni to unlock prizes and rewards. Play Pool Party now for free and enjoy the sunny days at the water park paradise!
instructions: Complete the levels by reaching the targets in this amazing match 3-game. If you match 4 or more same pool items, you will get boosters and power-ups that help you earn more points. Use the touch controls or the mouse to swap.

title: Cookie Crush 3
description: Welcome to Cookie Crush 3 - the newest iteration of the beloved and addictive match-3 game! Meet your new host Gingy, the cute gingerbread man. He will be pleased to guide you on your way through more than 700 levels. Come back every day and receive your Daily Rewards. Complete Daily Missions to earn extra coins and Boosters or play the Daily Challenge. Play Cookie Crush 3 now for free and enjoy tons of addictive match-3 challenges and calorie-free sweets!
instructions: Crush the cookies, complete the tasks and get full stars in the third adventure of this popular game series. Use the mouse or the touch controls to swap and match at least 3 of the same kind of cookies. If you match 4 or more, you can receive boosters!

title: Yummy Tales
description: Yummy Tales is a great new match 3 puzzle game. Meet Oscar, the smart little dog, and your best friend! He will help you feed your farm animals and make them happy! You have to match 3 or more fruits or vegetables of the same kind to remove them from the board. Continue to match fruits and veggies until your animals are saturated. Make sure to reach the level goal before you run out of moves or you will have to try it again! Puzzle your way through more than 900 different levels. Complete Daily Missions and Challenges to earn cool rewards and receive gifts that give you coins and boosters to help you beat even the most difficult levels. Don't waste any more time and start playing Yummy Tales right now for free!
instructions: Get full stars by matching at least 3 of the same fruits and vegetables by swapping them with the touch controls or the mouse. You can enjoy the boosters and power-ups if you match 4 or more items!

title: Hextetris
description: Suppose you are a big fan of the Tetris game. This game will make you excited about it. It is the compound of Tetris and match-3 games. Let make more score as you can. The higher level will be more difficult. Some features need to discover.
instructions: You can use the keyboard to play it. (arrow button and space bar).

title: Cookie Crush Christmas Edition
description: Cookie Crush Christmas Edition brings the beloved match3 classic Cookie Crush to a brand new Christmas setting. Enjoy all the fun, the festive mood and all the sweets absolutely free of any calories! Play Cookie Crush Christmas Edition now for free!
instructions: Swap and match at least 3 of the same kind of cookies in order to complete the tasks! Match 4 or more same cookies to get boosters and crush the cookies!

title: Zero Squares
description: Zero Squares is a minimalistic & relaxing puzzle game. Make the right moves to destroy all colorful squares and unlock the next challenge!Guide the tiles to the corresponding square. Use the arrow keys OR WASD to move around the grid. Reset the game if you find yourself in an endless loop.
instructions: Controls: Keyboard (WASD, Arrows), Touch/Mouse (Swipe Up, Down, Left, Right to move the squares) R for reset, Gamepad

title: 10x10 Block Puzzle
description: An addictive Tetris-style game to enjoy. Drag the jewel blocks to the desired places, to form full block lines in order to collect them. The game will end when there is no more space for any of the 3 current blocks. Play now!
instructions: Drag and drop the blocks.

title: Jigsaw Collections
description: Jigsaw puzzle is one of the entertaining, educational games that requires perseverance, accuracy, patience, and most importantly - to be attentive to the little things. Online jigsaw puzzles always attract a huge audience of completely different ages. In our game, everyone can find interesting collections for themselves! A game of this kind is an intrigue, a mystery that both an adult and a child would like to unravel. Search and combine the pieces into a single picture. For convenience, you can zoom in or out on the work surface. We wish you only victories!
instructions: Search and combine the pieces into a single picture. For convenience, you can zoom in or out on the work surface.

title: Blocks Fill Tangram Puzzle
description: Fun colorful addictive free block tangram game with over 1000 puzzles to solve Features include: - 12 difficulty levels (journeys) from easy and novice through, apprentice, proficient, advanced, expert, master, grandmaster, genius, extreme, insane and finally impossible - 80 puzzles per difficulty - Daily tangram puzzles and extra bonuses - Bonus rounds every 5 rounds - Hints
instructions: Use the mouse to finger to drag and drop blocks from the block panel to the left into spaces in the grid on the right. Complete the grid to win.

title: Futoshiki
description: If you like Sudoku, then you'll love Futoshiki. Futoshiki is another popular Japanese numeric puzzle game. Your aim is to put numbers from one to five in each row and column, so they do not repeat themselves. Numbers must also respect the relational signs placed between some cells. The game includes a generator offering the player three difficulty levels, from easy through medium to hard. For each generated puzzle only one unique solution is guaranteed.
instructions: Your goal is to fill cells with numbers 1-5. Each number can occur in row and column only once. You also have to obey inequality signs between cells. Tapping on selected cell toggles notes mode on and off.

title: Fruit Slide Reps
description: A fruit slicer game with a twist. You can only slice one fruit with your initial draw but luckily the slice keeps on repeating. So plan your slice, draw it out and see if it slices all of the fruit on each level. And don't hit any bombs!
instructions: Mouse Control: Hold the left mouse button down and draw the slice you want. Once the slice is complete quickly release the left mouse button. Touch Control: Swipe the slice you want and quickly remove your finger. If your slice is shaped such that the shape keeps repeating without going or slowly going off the screen, just swipe again to reset.

title: Jewel Miner
description: Jewel Miner is a simple and fun clicker game. Select 2 or more jewels with the same color and matching them. The more jewels you matching in a single tap – the more points you earn for every jewel.
instructions: How to play? - Tap or click on two or more jewels of the same kind to eliminate them. - Reach the target points of each level to move on.

title: Funny Birds Pop It Jigsaw
description: Funny Birds Pop It Jigsaw is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Arkadium's Codeword
description: All alphabetical letters make one or more appearance in the grid and are represented by the exact same number wherever they appear throughout the grid. To help you get started, a few letters are revealed before the game starts. To add a letter and crack the code, click a cell and then type or click on the letter you would like to place in the cell.
instructions: All alphabetical letters make one or more appearance in the grid and are represented by the exact same number wherever they appear throughout the grid. To help you get started, a few letters are revealed before the game starts. To add a letter and crack the code, click a cell and then type or click on the letter you would like to place in the cell.

title: Yellow Ball
description: Yellow Ball is a puzzle game where you need to hit the yellow ball with small white ball that is on the center of the circle. Yellow ball can change the positions in eight points. The white ball will rotate around the axis, so you need to find right angle to shoot and to hit yellow ball. Try it is funny to play, you can make three mistakes, after that the game will over.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Make 5 Hexa
description: Merge and win points! We have hexagons with numbers and colors and you need to decide the correct placement to merge them to score. You can also rotate the hexa's before using them as per your logic to get maximum score! Go for it!
instructions: Place three or more hexa blocks with the same number and color next to each other to merge them and get score. You can also rotate blocks before placing them on the grid!

title: Escape
description: You have to avoid escaping the circle. Keep the ball within the circle as long as possible. Use your physics skills to decide the direction of the ball and angle of rotation. Earn as many gems as you can which you can find within the circle and earn points.
instructions: Touch anywhere within the circle to rotate the circle. Your aim is to be grab the center jewel and stay inside the circle!

title: Water Sort Puzzle Color Sorting Game
description: Water Sort Puzzle is a fun and addictive puzzle game! Try to sort the colored water in the glasses until all colors in the same glass. A challenging yet relaxing game to exercise your brain!
instructions: HOW TO PLAY: Tap any glass to pour water to another glass. The rule is that you can only pour the water if it is linked to the same color and there’re enough space on the glass. Try not to get stuck - but don’t worry, you can always restart the level at any time.

title: Green Circles
description: Our ball in the game Green Circles has found itself in a very dangerous trap, moreover, it consists of thirty difficult levels that must be overcome in order to get out. Each level is two rotating circles with an empty space. There are sharp thorns inside the circle. If the ball hits them, the game is over. The circles are constantly rotating, you just need to have time to press the ball for the jump, and preferably twice, so that the jump is of the desired height and the ball does not touch the tip of the spike.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Save The Guy
description: Help save the dude! This is a fun online puzzle game where you need to help the guy get to the exit in each level to finish each puzzle. Try to complete all 20 levels in this fun brain teasing game.
instructions: Click or tap to activate objects

title: Love Totems
description: Pull pins to connect the blue and red ball to win. Solve the puzzle so the two lovers can reunite at long last. Avoid having either of the balls roll off screen or it is game over!
instructions: Use mouse or touch to pull pins.

title: Aqua Blocks
description: Experience the Tetris game like never before with the "Aqua Blocks". Aqua Blocks is an ultimate casual puzzle game that comes up with cute water graphics and lovely sound effects. The goal is to create a vertical or horizontal line of blocks. Drag and drop the blocks in the right place to fit them. Three different shapes will see at a time to make up the shape placement in your mind. For your help, you also get an Aqua Power which helps you to remove a horizontally and vertically block line from the board. Just tap on the power to use it. Strategically places all the blocks because no space left will lead you to game over. Clear more and more lines to make good scores. Aqua Blocks is a game that can keep casual gamers entertained for hours.
instructions: Drag and drop blocks.

title: Two Circles
description: This is a game with two circles, they are yellow and white. The circles can rotate, or they can change the place. You need to match the white balls with white ring and yellow ball with yellow ring. The balls will come from the top and the bottom of the game. So you need to rotate the rings to match the balls with same color.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Ball Sort Puzzle New
description: An addictive puzzle and matching game to train your brain. Move the balls properly to sort them into separate tubes (same color balls in the same tube). Play now!
instructions: Tap the tube to select the top ball, then tap another tube to move it there. Note: A ball can only be placed on top of another same color ball.

title: Dino Park Jigsaw
description: Dino Park Jigsaw is a free online game from the genre of puzzle and jigsaw games. In this game, you have a total of 6 jigsaw puzzles. You need to start from the first, solve the jigsaw, and go to the next image. You have three modes for each picture: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Turn Dot
description: Turn Dot is a puzzle game with white dot or ball. The ball need to move on the yellow path. Tap on the screen to change the way on moving the ball. Move only on the selected path if you go outside the path or hit on the corners the game will over. So tap when you need to pass the corner and have fun with this game.
instructions: Tap on screen to play.

title: 1010 Jungle Blocks
description: 1010 Jungle Blocks is a very interesting block puzzle game. In this game you need to pick and drop the set of blocks on the board. After dropping the set, if a horizontal or vertical line of 10 blocks is formed, the blocks will be removed from the board. The more number of blocks you remove at once, more score you will get. Don’t let the board crowded with the blocks. You can play till you are able to fit the existing block sets .
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Square
description: Square is a puzzle game with ball and a square. The ball is in the square and only the bottom side of the square is open. When the ball hit the bottom of the square you need to close that side. So tap on the screen every time when ball is on the bottom area of the square. Try to keep the ball inside the square.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Hexa Puzzle Game
description: Hexa is a puzzle game, it is addictive and funny to play. The goal of this game is to connect the lines to get the shapes that is on the help image. At the beginning of the game click on the ? or help to see how the hexa puzzle will look for that level. Some levels are more harder than other, so you do not give up. Tap on the blocks and move them to change the positions.
instructions: Use mouse or tap the blocks to play this game.

title: Make All Happy
description: Welcome to "Make All Happy," a delightful puzzle game where your goal is to spread happiness to all the blocks. To achieve this, simply tap on a block to switch its state, along with the states of its horizontal and vertical neighbors. Keep toggling the blocks strategically until every single one of them is in a happy state. Can you master the art of making all the blocks happy?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Brain Tricky Puzzles
description: It seems a simple problem, but it is often not that simple! Quickly answer the questions on the screen, the answer is in the picture! Do you want to change your mind? Maybe there will be a different effect!
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Candy Burst
description: Candy Burst, an iconic Match 3 puzzle game offering you great gaming experience filled with relaxation and fun. Swap and match Candies in dazzling combinations to complete the challenging levels. Have Fun is this epic Match three match game!
instructions: swipe to match candies

title: Ball Maze
description: Balls Maze is a classic puzzle game, perfect for taking a quick break to train your brain. It’s designed to be a surprisingly simple solo game played by swiping through fun 2D retro labyrinths and popping balloons. Smash all the balloons in the maze and you will win!!!
instructions: Touch and drag to rotate the level.

title: Block Puzzle Classic
description: Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces. Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.
instructions: Tips For Beginners. Drag wooden blocks into the 10×10 grid. Remove blocks by creating complete lines vertically or horizontally. Clear as multiple blocks at once as possible. Don't forget to use props. No space to stack blocks, the game is over.

title: Water Sort Puzzle
description: Water Sort Puzzle is a simple, fun and addictive sort puzzle game.Your next task is to sort the colored water in the cup until all the colors in the glass are the same. The game is easy to get used to, but it is difficult to become an expert and there are 1000 puzzles to challenge you.A challenging yet relaxing game to train your brain!
instructions: Touch any glass bottle to pour water into another bottle.The rule is that you can only pour water into another bottle if it is linked to the same color and there is enough space on the glass bottle.Do your best and don't get stuck. Don't worry, you can always start over at any time. Or use the help to add a new message.

title: Puzzle Blocks
description: Fill up all of the empty spaces with your blocks to pass each level
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Three Lines
description: At this game there is three lines. A Blue Line, Orange Line and Yellow Line. There is one target on each line. Balls with different speeds move through the lines from top to bottom. You need to match the target with the ball. Do not let more balls fall or the game will over. Try to target the balls on all lines. An interesting and fun game in which you will find fun for you.
instructions: Tap on the targets to play this game.

title: Monster Match
description: When monsters start their evil activity... However, some of them cute and harmless. Play with them on this pattern and have fun! Match monsters at the pattern and build a line of three or more similar monsters to let them disappear.
instructions: Create patterns and matches

title: Word Finding Puzzle Game
description: The game is easy to play, slide the letter up, down, left, right, diagonal in any of the eight directions. Search and find all hidden words in the grid. Increase your vocabulary and exercise your brain!
instructions: Correct swipe the letters horizontally, vertically, diagonally, forwards or backwards to form a specific hidden word.
